anger.thought: What specific sins do you need to confess and forsake in the area of anger? (See Ephesians 4:31.)

despair.thought: What specific struggles or sins do you need to confess and forsake in the area of unbelief or hopelessness? (see Psalm 42)

fear.thought: What specific struggles or sins do you need to confess and forsake in the area of fear, worry, or anxiety? (See Matthew 6:25-34.)

foolishness.thought: What specific sins do you need to confess and forsake in the area of foolishness? (see Proverbs 14:16)
